title: "H
content:
Went into [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102052944/http:/www.orangeitalic.com/fonts/other.html) this morning: by the prolific Mr Shwartz.   
that's better than coffee to wake up.   
   
And also, am I the only who missed this [hand tuned bitmaps](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102052944/http:/www.orangeitalic.com/fonts/bitmap.shtml)?
author: Gregory Cadars

comments.content:
"I was just about to post something to Typographica."   
   
Please do and share, it's rare to see well displayed works like this one.   
(especially when they comes from [FB Fritz](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102052944/http:/www.orangeitalic.com/fonts/fritz.shtml)designer)

Nope, you're not Greg. A lot of that stuff has never been   
revealed until now. And you beat me to the link! I was just   
about to post something to _Typographica_.
